ygData.subject: Re: Dark Elf SK
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Someone on rodcet nife was selling a pack that makes everything half weight for 150pp I think the guys name was paraflox or something like that. Tekman
ygData.messageBody:
--- David <milamber@...> wrote:
> I was just making an observation with this
> statement. The only packs I know of that add about
> zero weight are a shaman summon spell, and that bag
> disappears as soon as you logout, as well as the
> items stored in the bag. Also these bags only have
> 4 slots, and have heard you can place 15 lbs. bricks
> of ore into them and it apples only a fraction of
> the weight to your encumbrance load (which is good
> for hunting ... rock dervs(?) in fire storm that
> give you these bricks). I WISH they would come out
> with a magic backpack that would do this, that
> wouldn't disappear at logout time. (how about that
> =)
>
Someone on rodcet nife was selling a pack that makes
everything half weight for 150pp I think the guys name
was paraflox or something like that.

Tekman
